SELECT EBOARD_NO , GUBUN_NO, CASE WHEN CGORY_NO='101' THEN '[일반]' WHEN CGORY_NO='103' THEN '[인사]' ELSE '[일정]' END AS CGORY_NO, EMP_ID,EMP_NAME, EBOARD_TITLE, EBOARD_READCOUNT, EBOARD_REGDATE FROM ENTRBOARD WHERE CGORY_NO = #{cgory_no} AND EBOARD_DELFLAG ='N' ORDER BY EBOARD_REGDATE DESC
